section.title: Welcome to redBorder
section.para: Thank you for downloading or acquiring redborder version 3.
This manual is intended for those users who have the Enterprise edition.

section.title: Getting to know the Official redborder Installation Guide
section.para: This guide contains very useful information that will help you correctly install and configure redborder Manager.

The guide explains in detail how to navigate the Manager installation wizard and is works with both DVD installations and with direct downloads from the ISO. The complete installation of the platform is carried out in two phases:

listitem.para: Installation and configuration of the Manager
Configuration and registration of the redborder Apps (IPS)

section.para: This document is ideal both for users who want to replace the old version and those that are installing redborder version 3 for the first time.
If you are an experienced user and have already installed redborder Manager and/or sensors previously, you can skip directly to Chapter 3 where you will learn to navigate the redborder web plataform.

section.title: Requirements for redborder installation
section.para: The redborder platform can be installed via two possible infrastructures:

listitem.para: Physical machine: your computer's local hard drive (Hardware).
Virtural machine: virtualization or Cloud structure.

important.title: Important
important.para: Requirements for installing redborder Manager on a physical machine:
Memory and storage: 100GB of hard drive and a minimum of 16GB of RAM. We recommend 32GB of RAM.(This figure will depend on the number of sensors assigned).
If a cluster has been created, two network interfaces are needed: one for the management network (Management IP Address), and another synchronization network (Sync IP address).
